Posts.Content: hannahbobannah1 wrote: Hello. Have never been in a chatroom before so please bear with me if i have done anything wrong. I am writing as my mother-in-law was diagnosed with metaplastic breast cancer back in November 08. She had a full mastectomy but has since had four reoccurrences. She has just discovered another lump while having radiotherapy, but that is the only treatment she has had so far. I am just wondering if anyone else out there has had this kind of cancer and what treatment they had. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: metaplastic reoccurrence hannahbobannah1 hannahbobannah1
